Shield Specialization.name: Shield Specialization
descriptions: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2% and has a 40% chance to generate 2 rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 3% and has a 60% chance to generate 3 rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4% and has a 80% chance to generate 4 rage when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 5% and has a 100% chance to generate 5 rage when a block occurs.

Evasive Maneuvers.name: Evasive Maneuvers
descriptions: Reduces the chance you are critically struck by melee and ranged attacks by 2%.
Reduces the chance you are critically struck by melee and ranged attacks by 4%.
Reduces the chance you are critically struck by melee and ranged attacks by 6%.

Rally to Battle.name: Rally to Battle
descriptions: Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by 5.
Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by 10.

Toughness.name: Toughness
descriptions: Increases your armor value from items by 4%.
Increases your armor value from items by 8%.
Increases your armor value from items by 12%.
Increases your armor value from items by 16%.
Increases your armor value from items by 20%.

Iron Will.name: Iron Will
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 5%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 10%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 15%.

Last Stand.name: Last Stand
descriptions: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum hit points for 20 seconds.  After the effect expires, the hit points are lost.

Barricade.name: Barricade
descriptions: Allows your Shield Block ability to block an additional attack and increases the duration by 1 second. If you block or avoid an attack within 1 second of using Shield Block, the rage cost will be refunded and your next Revenge will critically hit.

Punishment.name: Punishment
descriptions: Gives your Revenge ability a 20% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Revenge ability a 40% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Revenge ability a 60% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Revenge ability a 80% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Revenge ability a 100% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

Defiance.name: Defiance
descriptions: Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 3% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 6% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 9% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 12% while in Defensive Stance.
Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 15% while in Defensive Stance.

Shield Breaker.name: Shield Breaker
descriptions: Reduces the rage cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 1, and reduces the global cooldown by 0.1 sec.
Reduces the rage cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 3, and reduces the global cooldown by 0.3 sec.
Reduces the rage cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 5, and reduces the global cooldown by 0.5 sec.

Sword Breaker.name: Sword Breaker
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Disarm ability by 10 sec, and reduces the rage cost by 5.
Reduces the cooldown of your Disarm ability by 20 sec, and reduces the rage cost by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of your Disarm ability by 30 sec, and reduces the rage cost by 15.

Provocation.name: Provocation
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Taunt ability by 1 sec, and increases the range by 5 yards.
Reduces the cooldown of your Taunt ability by 2 sec, and increases the range by 10 yards.

Unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
descriptions: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by 5 secs, and reduces the cooldown by 10 minutes.
Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by 10 secs, and reduces the cooldown by 20.000016666666667 minutes.

Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
descriptions: Slam the target with your shield or buckler, causing 352 damage, modified by your shield block value multiplied by your rage, and dispelling 1 magic effect on the target.  Also causes a high amount of threat.

Gag Order.name: Gag Order
descriptions: Gives your Shield Bash ability a 50% chance to silence the target for 3 seconds, and reduces the rage cost by 50%.
Gives your Shield Bash ability a 100% chance to silence the target for 3 seconds, and reduces the rage cost by 100%.

One-Handed Weapon Specialization.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 6%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 8%.
Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 10%.

Devastate.name: Devastate
descriptions: Causes your Sunder Armor ability to deal damage equal to your weapon's average damage. This damage is multiplied by each application of Sunder Armor.

Iron Grip.name: Iron Grip
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Disarm effects by 50%, and reduces the cooldown of your Concussion Blow by 15 seconds.
Increases your chance to resist Disarm effects by 100%, and reduces the cooldown of your Concussion Blow by 30 seconds.
